thread.title: Upstate NY man killed in ATV crash
thread.title_full: Upstate NY man killed in ATV crash - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: wcax.com
title: Upstate NY man killed in ATV crash
text:
NEDROW, N.Y. (AP) - A 45-year-old central New York man has been killed in an all-terrain vehicle crash.
The Onondaga County Sheriff's Office says Richard Isaac, a resident of the Onondaga Indian Nation, was traveling southbound early Monday on Route 11-A south of Syracuse when he lost control of his ATV and was ejected.
Deputies say Isaac was not wearing a helmet and suffered a serious head injury. He was transported to Upstate University Hospital, where he was pronounced dead.
The sheriff's accident investigation team processed the accident scene, and deputies believe the victim was trying to avoid an animal in the roadway when he lost control of the ATV.
